name: Treasure Hunter (itch) (Rjomba)
description:
A small game for Weekly Game Jam 169

You're stuck in a forest with only a poke stick and a shovel. Try to buy a ticket back home by finding some treasure in the forest. Shop nearby also has some useful tools and supplies. Good luck!

Movement - Arrow keys
Inventory  - Hold Tab. Use up/down arrow keys to change tools
Interaction key - Space

Exit - Esc

Use mouse to interact with  the shop menu
